title: A Thread of Kindness :)
body:
I've noticed a very large amount of hate on the boards lately with all the changes Riot is making. 

This thread is here just to be nice; no opinions on anything that's going on for people to argue about. I hope if you're reading this you're having a pleasant day :)

replies.body: http://33.media.tumblr.com/ec49c99bea0aa01ce0006b13a9eaa0d6/tumblr_myy6iiueHe1rrzdauo1_500.gif
I don't think you should be posting stuff like that on in here, there could be kids surfing around y'know? That stuff could give them nightmares.
Kids?? I think that would give even adults nightmares. Mercy, please.
why satan has never looked so tempting
http://i.giphy.com/HcAEZz1A34c24.gif
DOES THAT LOOK LIKE THE FACE OF MERCY TO YOU?!
you call this image kindness? this is devilry of the most evil kind! XD
"thread of kindness" does not equal that.
That's the most evil thing i could imagine!
Riot Sweet's pic tho, So cute :3
she truly is sweet
We need more things like this. Thank you for doing something to make everybody a little bit happier.

I'll try...despite my horrible opinion of everyone.

I love you all, and even through the tough time, the trolls, the hatred, I am proud to be a member of the League of Legends community.
Once you filter out all the asshats, this is a pretty good place to be.
even more so when you realize the asshats are less then 5% of the play base.

I don't know you and I don't imagine I ever will, but you seem like a lovely person. I try my best to make this game fun for the people I play with, and I'm pleased that there are others out there with the same goal. Keep up the good work, and happy farming!

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/April_2014/PCC/inkiness1.jpg

Because why not poros :P?

Side note: Thanks for keeping this thread what it was meant to be about guys. I'll be honest, I was a little worried there was going to be flames next I came on the boards.
give the community some cred, we read the titles, have complaints about lee sin go to the lee sin is broken discussion, want to actually feel happy? come here
Ya I know. I didn't want to enforce the worry but it was there, at the back of my mind I knew it could happen. Very glad it didn't though.

Yeah it's very unfortunate. It seems like on these boards everybody just comes to circle-jerk why X,Y,Z champs are OP or UP or need to be changed, or shouldn't be changed like that, and just how overall Riot is screwing the game up.

Just play the game and let Riot worry about "screwing their game up." As it stands, they have the most popular free to play game in the world, so I think they're doing something right. If you don't like what they're doing, LEAVE. Why stick around and down everybody when you are openly admitting to disliking the course the company is taking with their product?

Yeah I know some people are only reacting to specific changes, but can we get some more love for changes we do like instead of all the things we hate?

I personally agree with most of the changes Riot has made recently, especially in the JUNGLE (le gasp). It makes me sad when I see everybody talking about how the jungle is straight garbage now, and how its unfun, and only 3 champs are viable. None of that is true :( I can play more junglers this season than I can last season! Yeah its harder overall, but the potential for more champs to succeed is also higher as well :(.

Here's to Riot, keep it up!

You seem like a decent person. I will save you for last.

(EDIT: The last person gets the biggest piece of the cake, of course)

Kindness.
/thread
Compliment of the day: I like your eyes. The universe itself has tried to make galaxies in the image of such wonders.

I like it here. Act like a respectable person and people will return the respect to you. Also, it feels like home.

And why thank you, OP.
